description.full: Get search result from Knora - 2 cases: simple search and extended search

tags.string: {ReadResourcesSequence} searchResult the answer to a search request.
tags.name: searchResult

description.full:
Converts search results from JSON-LD to a [[ReadResourcesSequence]] and requests information about ontology entities.
This function is passed to subscribe as a pointer (instead of redundantly defining the same lambda function).
description.summary:
Converts search results from JSON-LD to a [[ReadResourcesSequence]] and requests information about ontology entities.
This function is passed to subscribe as a pointer (instead of redundantly defining the same lambda function).

tags.string: {ApiServiceResult} countQueryResult the response to a count query.

description.full: Shows total number of results returned by a count query.
description.summary: Shows total number of results returned by a count query.

description.full:
Loads the next page of results.
The results will be appended to the existing ones.
